bug.author: cheyang
bug.summary: Disable DNS cache failed in fuse docker image
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: What version of Alluxio are you using? Describe the bug The same issue as <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/issues/9760>#9760</denchmark-link> when using fuse in docker . <denchmark-code>/entrypoint.sh: line 81: /usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8-openjdk/jre/lib/security/java.security: Permission denied </denchmark-code>
Please also fix <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/blob/master/integration/docker/Dockerfile.fuse>https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/blob/master/integration/docker/Dockerfile.fuse</denchmark-link>
thanks.
